entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH, Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 a.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
